name: Unfulfilled Game
description:
Goal:

Try to complete the game.

And then:

Play to keep playing. Forever.

---------------------------- Controls:

Q: left / D: right / SPACE: jump

Small jump: create a big platform

Going right: create a medium platform

High jump: create a small platform

R: reset

ESCAPE: quit

Credits:

An interactive experience created in 48 hours for the Digital Art game jam by

Eva Abollivier - Game designer / 2D artist

Maxime Besnard - Sound designer

Victor Cottineau - Game designer / Programmer

"Samba Isobel" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
